Title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams frontline worker pilot in Teams Admin Center
Description:
Deploy a frontline worker (FLW) pilot in Teams Admin Center
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Copilot Chat - Usage intensity and new app coverage
Description:
The Copilot Chat usage report will include metrics on prompts submitted and expanded coverage across new host applications. Admins will now see total and average prompt counts at both tenant and user levels, along with user activity insights such as active days and last activity dates. Additionally, the report introduces visibility into Copilot Chat usage within Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote—enabling better tracking of adoption and engagement across these core Microsoft 365 apps. All metrics focus on unlicensed users and support export functionality for further analysis. User-level information is anonymized by default.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Prepurchase Capacity Packs for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Description:
This feature integrates pre-purchased capacity packs into Microsoft 365 admin center for M365 Copilot Chat. Administrators can apply pre-purchased message capacity to Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat before incurring pay-as-you-go charges.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Copilot Search management and insights
Description:
Enable AI administrators to configure, customize, and measure Copilot Search across their organization. This feature provides centralized tools to manage search connectors, tailor search experiences to organizational needs, and gain actionable insights into adoption, usage patterns, and content engagement. Designed to enhance productivity and maximize the value of Microsoft 365 Copilot, it supports both setup and ongoing optimization of enterprise search experiences.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
Description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Locate your Copilot Pages in Copilot Chat navigation pane
Description:
For quick access to your Copilot Pages, find all page artifacts created across your apps/modules in one place underneath the Chat section in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint -  Apply watermark to PDF
Description:
OneDrive for Web now lets you add text or images as watermarks to your PDF documents. You can place the watermark in front of your content and choose the perfect location and angle for it.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Collection Policies: Scope classifiers and activity to track on all Windows devices
Description:
Allow customers to scope classification (SITs- Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
Description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: January CY2026

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
Description:
This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments
Description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
Description:
A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
Description:
Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Viva Connections cards in Microsoft 365 Copilots
Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot brings Viva Connections cards to conversations. When a card is relevant for a specific topic, the card will surface in the conversation chat and users will be able to interact with it directly from Microsoft 365 Copilot without interrupting the user's flow.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: March CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
Description:
Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Note: We have updated the cloud environments to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365: SMTP onboarding to App Role Based Access Control
Description:
We're simplifying how organizations grant applications permission to send email on behalf of mailboxes. Today, customers must manually assign permissions to each individual mailbox using PowerShell, which is time-consuming and inefficient. With this new capability, admins can assign the SMTP.SendAsApp role to an app through App Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), enabling group-based or scoped access to mailboxes. This eliminates the need for per-mailbox configuration and streamlines onboarding for SMTP clients using OAuth. It’s a scalable, secure, and modern approach to managing mailbox access for applications.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Unread News Notifications in Connections
Description:
Users will receive a weekly notification in the Connections apps in Microsoft Teams on mobile and desktop linking them to relevant SharePoint news that they might have missed in the preceding week. This unread news will be available in the "News" tab in the Connections app under the "unread" pill.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Immersive Search
Description:
After completing a search in Outlook, a user will see a Copilot entry point that will take them to an LLM generated summary of their search query (emails, Teams messages and documents) within their Copilot side pane. They will be able to interact further with Copilot to dig deeper into these results and take action items accordingly.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: News AI audio briefing in Connections Mobile
Description:
This feature provides an AI generated audio overview of top 10 news items in the Viva Connections news reader experience. It plays the 10 audio clips sequentially to help users catch up on top news in a hands-free manner. This experience will be available in the Viva Connections App in Teams mobile on iOS and android.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
Description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easier access to Researcher in Microsoft Word
Description:
The Researcher agent now has easier entry points on the Word canvas —making it faster to go from idea to polished research report without breaking your flow.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Delete survey cycles
Description:
This feature enables Glint Admins to delete survey cycles within a configured program. When a cycle is deleted, all associated data—including reporting—will be removed from the platform. The feature is intended for removing obsolete or test cycles that are no longer needed.
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): New file extension for Copilot pages
Description:
We are introducing a new file extension for Copilot pages, ".page". This new file extension will continue to support admin toggles, sensitivity labels, data loss prevention, multi-geo, Purview eDiscovery, version history, export, audit logs, and data subject requests. The functionality and support for the .page file extension will be identical to the existing .loop file extension, with the only difference being the file extension and the associated file icon. For a comprehensive list of features supported refer to: Summary table of admin management, governance, lifecycle, and compliance capabilities based on experience
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/loop/loop-compliance-summary?view=o365-worldwide#summary-table-of-admin-management-governance-lifecycle-and-compliance-capabilities-based-on-experience
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments
Description:
The Microsoft 365 app will be updated to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for GCC-M environments. This update includes a UI refresh and quick access to key modules like Chat, Search, Create, Apps, and Notebooks.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
Description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: January CY2026

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Agents in Copilot Chat available on Edge Sidebar
Description:
Use agents in Copilot Chat on Edge Sidebar to simplify tasks.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web (GCC)
Description:
After further review, we need to roll this back. We apologize for any inconvenience. Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature release, eligible users with access to Excel for the web will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide suggestions
Description:
Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for retroactive updates
Description:
This feature will introduce an alternative solution to the existing Advanced Configurations feature that allows an Admin to retroactively update simpler attribute scenarios associated to surveys. This alternate provides a friendly user experience in a new wizard format - and as well as offering the option to perform the feature with zero file uploads.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
Description:
Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
Description:
Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
Description:
When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
Description:
We mistakenly marked this roadmap as "launched." We apologize for any inconvenience. When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: Multi-admin change notifications for Microsoft 365 Backup
Description:
Set of pre-defined administrators can be configured to receive email notifications for any potentially damaging changes to the backup settings or actions taken to ensure proper oversight of the tool in the organization.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Universal Print: Pull Print queues
Description:
Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution. Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any associated printer, depending on the setup.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Signed Adobe & Docusign documents saved to the originating folder
Description:
Documents signed via Adobe or DocuSign eSignature, when initiated through the SharePoint eSignature platform, will now be saved in the originating SharePoint folder instead of the default Apps folder. The originating folder is the folder where the starting document was located at the point of eSignature request initiation.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: [Data Loss Prevention] - [Admin units support for SharePoint Online]
Description:
Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Setting to pin M365 Copilot app to Windows taskbar
Description:
This feature allows Global and Intune administrators to pin the M365 Copilot app to the Windows taskbar, providing users with easy access to M365 Copilot capabilities like Chat, Search, Agents, Notebooks and Create. This setting applies to all Intune-managed Windows 10 and 11 devices with the app installed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Entra: Improved Backup and Restore Experience for the Authenticator App on iOS
Description:
Users of the Microsoft Authenticator app on iOS will be able to back up account names—including Microsoft work or school accounts, Microsoft personal accounts, and third-party accounts like Amazon or Google—using iCloud and iCloud Keychain. This enables secure, end-to-end encrypted backup of account names and TOTP credentials. When setting up a new iOS device, account names will automatically appear in the app, and users can sign in to complete setup.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Account Manager
Description:
Users can use the new Account Manager feature to learn more about their Microsoft account, display their profile picture, and add new accounts (if permitted by their organization).
GA date: August CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Text Editor Copilot 'Refine' update
Description:
SharePoint is updating the capabilities of its text editor Copilot. Now, you can not only use copilot to rewrite your existing text but also use it to keep writing or add a grounding document. By answering the question "what do you want copilot to change", you can perform any number of refinements to your existing content.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to rephrase text as desired through custom prompt in PowerPoint
Description:
Now you will be able to rewrite text using Copilot through natural language prompting in PowerPoint.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to rephrase text as desired through custom prompt in PowerPoint
Description:
Now you will be able to rewrite text using Copilot through natural language prompting in PowerPoint.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: new scenarios enabling in Microsoft 365 Monitoring
Description:
Microsoft Entra monitoring in Microsoft 365 admin center’s Service Health Dashboard is updated with additional organization level monitoring.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Usability and privacy improvements for live captions and live transcript in meetings
Description:
Introducing enhancements to live captions and live transcripts in Microsoft Teams to make meetings more intuitive, accessible, and privacy-focused. Live captions are now scrollable, allowing users to review past conversation with more flexibility and over a larger surface area. Next, copying captions is disabled by default to protect sensitive information and support compliance. Additionally, the live transcript panel won’t open automatically with features that trigger transcription—like recording, giving users greater control over their layout. Lastly, If transcription is enabled, users who attempt to open the live transcript panel will see a banner suggesting they switch to live captions for real-time comprehension. These updates streamline the experience while supporting accessibility and privacy.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Slash commands for apps
Description:
You can now interact with your favorite apps directly from Teams chat and channels compose box using slash commands. Type / and start interacting with Apps and Agents, invoke workflows and more.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Report junk + block or unsubscribe in one same action
Description:
We’re making it easier to keep your inbox clean and under control. Now, when you report an email as junk, you’ll also have the option to unsubscribe—if that’s available. This helps stop unwanted messages at the source and keeps your blocked list from getting overloaded. If unsubscribing isn’t possible, you’ll still be able to block the sender to prevent future emails. This update gives you more control and a simpler way to manage unwanted messages.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Attachments preservation for users on hold
Description:
Enables cloud attachment preservation for users put on infinite hold so that file versions shared are preserved across any OneDrive or SharePoint site. This is a new capability which is different from the existing capability of applying label to cloud attachments and links present in OneDrive and SharePoint and shared in Exchange, Teams, Viva Engage and Copilot
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Default Teams Calling global policy to enable users to transcribe or record calls
Description:
We’re updating the default global calling policy for new tenants to allow users to transcribe or record calls. Previously, these settings were turned off by default in the host global policy. With this update, recording and transcription will be enabled by default in the global calling policy for new tenants and existing tenants who have not modified the host global policy. This change will not impact existing custom policies or modified global policies. After this rollout, recording and transcription services will be more accessible to users, allowing them to turn on and use recording and transcription as needed during Teams calls. Neither recording nor transcription will be automatically enabled in Teams calls. This update is designed to broaden access to AI-powered features like Calls Recap and Calling Copilot, enhancing the overall calling experience. It also brings calling policy defaults in line with Teams meetings policies, where recording and transcription are already enabled by default.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft SharePoint: New web part for FAQs
Description:
SharePoint FAQ web part help assist content owners keep their content fresh and relevant. Powered by Microsoft 365 Copilot, this new web part can help content owner easily curate FAQ by working with agents and connected grounding data. With a Human-in-the-Loop approach, it ensures high-quality, trustworthy FAQs—without the hassle. The result? A living FAQ that evolves with your organization's needs.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced Meeting Protection - Prevent Screen Capture
Description:
To address the issue of unauthorized screen captures during meetings, the Prevent Screen Capture feature ensures that if a user attempts to take a screen capture, the meeting window will turn black, thereby protecting sensitive information. This feature will be available on Teams desktop applications (both Windows and Mac) and Teams mobile applications (both iOS and Android). For users joining from unsupported platforms, they will be placed in audio-only mode to maintain the integrity of the meeting's content.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Search
Description:
Simple to use AI-powered enterprise search experience that quickly surfaces relevant information using work data you have access to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Improved processing status experience for Content AI models in SharePoint Online
Description:
We’re introducing a new activity pane in SharePoint Online to help users track and troubleshoot Content AI model processing. Starting with document translation and autofill, users will be able to view real-time status (in progress, completed, failed) for individual files, bulk selections, or the full library. Completed status will include enriched details like language codes, glossary usage, and column extraction counts. This new pane will eventually replace the current “processing status” column, providing a more consistent and actionable experience.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings
Description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to IRM exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusions apply on both target and source file paths. 3. File path exclusions for removable media - We will start supporting file path exclusions for removable media. 4. Exclusion support for browser - Domain exclusions are now supported for browsing indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Communications Dashboard
Description:
A central hub for corporate communicators and network administrators to access information and manage tasks across the communications lifecycle, starting with campaigns, analytics, leader and audiences, and advanced moderation.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Outlook: FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows
Description:
FSLogix support for the new Outlook for Windows includes registering the new Outlook for Windows package by family name and persisting the user data in LocalAppData. It will allow the roaming of user data in new Outlook for non-persistent VDI. #newoutlookforwindows
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365-apps/outlook/get-started/virtualized-desktop-infrastructure
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
Description:
Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
Description:
After further review, this needs to roll back. We apologize for any inconvenience. We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Microsoft Purview eDiscovery - Guest access for export downloads
Description:
This feature allows external guest users to securely access and download export packages from Purview eDiscovery cases, with administrators able to set restrictions such as allowed IP addresses and token expiration to support secure external collaboration.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
Description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recent activity is part of Copilot's dynamic document snapshot in Word
Description:
Select the Activity tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a document for a summary of recent comments and changes. Choose a time window of 3 days, 1 week, or 2 weeks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scope prompts to specific Channels in Teams in Copilot Chat
Description:
Users will be able to scope their prompts to specific Channels in Teams to get more focused responses when using Copilot Chat.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Say "Hey Copilot" to activate voice conversations with the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows
Description:
With the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows, say “Hey Copilot” to activate real-time voice conversations with Copilot. The wake word keeps you in flow, helping you draft content, analyze data, and get critical insights without having to navigate to a separate app or window. Built for enterprise, it respects your organization’s compliance and privacy settings, activating only when called.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Outlook
Description:
Organizers and co-organizers can now easily edit the details of Teams Town Hall instances. A direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page is now accessible from Outlook calendar. This enhancement brings the same seamless editing and registration management experience already available in webinar, bringing a consistent experience across all event types.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now supports more file types in search grounding.
Description:
We are expanding the file types supported in Copilot Chat to align with the Microsoft Search experience.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Apply partial settings for Android devices using configuration profiles in the Teams admin center
Description:
In the Teams admin center, admins can now modify, review, and apply configuration settings to Android devices without overriding other settings ensuring only the desired changes are made.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
Description:
Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for endpoint. It is applicable when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Dictionary
Description:
Tenant administrators can now upload a Custom Dictionary through the M365 Admin Portal's Copilot Settings page to include tenant-specific terminologies. This enhancement improves entity recognition in Teams meeting transcripts, benefiting both Recap and Copilot's understanding of the content.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Copilot Prepare for Meeting in Calendar
Description:
With so many of us in back-to-back meetings, it can be a real struggle to stay on top of pre-reads, action items, and even what each meeting is about. Copilot can identify and summarize the key points so you can show up prepared in just a few minutes. When you have an upcoming meeting, Copilot proactively shows you a "Prepare" button in your inbox which helps you quickly get context by creating a summary of the meeting and showing and summarizing relevant files, leveraging the power of the Microsoft Graph. Now you have all the most important details you need and can arrive prepared and ready to engage in a productive conversation. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Add custom sounds for Mail Notifications, Reactions, and Calendar Reminders
Description:
In your Notification settings, you'll be able to add a custom sound for your mail notifications, mail reactions, and calendar notifications (aka reminders). #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Email Attachment Preview in Content Explorer
Description:
This feature allows admins to view the attachments of an email within purview content explorer. This will help admins with their investigation process
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Time to read on SharePoint News posts
Description:
Each news item in SharePoint will display estimated read time of the article.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Prompt for permitted users to sign in to OneDrive app with personal Microsoft account
Description:
Users have long been able to use personal Microsoft accounts with the OneDrive app on corporate Windows devices—unless restricted by admin policy. This new feature introduces a prompt only when a personal account is already signed in on the device, encouraging users to also sign in to the OneDrive app with that account. Administrators who have already restricted personal accounts on corporate devices can continue to manage this as before. Organizations that have already disabled personal OneDrive accounts on corporate devices with the DisablePersonalSync policy will not see this prompt. Administrators can also suppress it using the DisableNewAccountDetection policy. More information on configuring policies can be found here:
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/use-group-policy#manage-onedrive-using-group-policy
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot generates the new presentation in a new file when starting from an existing presentation
Description:
Now, when creating a presentation using Copilot from an existing presentation, it will create the new presentation in a new file without affecting the original presentation
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP - Edge to enforce USB, network, and printer group restrictions on files
Description:
Purview Admins can now use either Removable USB device, Network Share, and/or Printer groups within DLP policies, these restrictions are now extensible to the Edge browser experience.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings
Description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to Insider Risk Management (IRM) exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusions apply on both target and source file paths. 3. File path exclusions for removable media - We will start supporting file path exclusions for removable media. 4. Exclusion support for browser - Domain exclusions are now supported for browsing indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
Description:
With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness and control over the process.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
Description:
Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
Description:
Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Keyword monitoring enhancements
Description:
Network and Verified admins can setup specific keywords to monitor across conversations in their network. The enhancements include a new, modern experience of the existing functionality. Keyword monitoring will now accessible in the new communications dashboard experience within the advanced moderation page. The feature is no longer available in the Engage admin center.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Theme moderation in Viva Engage
Description:
Network admins and corporate communicators can input custom themes of interest and track new conversations that match these themes. Theme monitoring is accessible in the new communications dashboard experience in the advanced moderation page.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
Description:
We mistakenly marked the roadmap as "launched." The correct status is In Development. We apologize the inconvenience. Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
Description:
Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
Description:
This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle separate retention policies for Copilots and AI Apps
Description:
Enable admins to configure retention policies for various Copilots and AI Apps.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for web and in Teams
Description:
Bringing the power of Microsoft Copilot to OneNote for web and in Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
Description:
Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Auto-run Data Access Governance (DAG) reports
Description:
You can now schedule to run your DAG reports automatically every 28 days and also receive notification when the auto-run completes.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Skills Scenarios for Leaders in Viva Insights
Description:
With Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Insights, leaders can unlock powerful skills insights for their teams—driven by People Skills data. Copilot enables leaders to explore their organization’s skill distribution, identify individuals with specific capabilities, and generate dynamic visual reports to support strategic decision-making.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal - Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Microsoft 365 Copilot retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
Description:
Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Microsoft 365 Copilot interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Hide people previewing files in OneDrive and SharePoint
Description:
This setting will allow administrators to disable the presence feature in the OneDrive and SharePoint file previewing experience on selected sites. This item is inaccurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
Description:
Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Update to Microsoft Syntex translation
Description:
The document translation service enables users to create translated copies quickly and easily while preserving the original format and structure of the file. We’re updating the service to allow creating translated copies in up to 10 languages with a single request. This update will be available for both manual and rule-based requests.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Enhancing SharePoint document translation with glossary feature
Description:
We’re thrilled to announce the addition of a glossary capability to our SharePoint AI content document translation model. This feature delivers precise, industry-specific translations, fostering unparalleled clarity and consistency for your documents. Experience effortless integration and user-friendly operation within your existing SharePoint libraries.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
Description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Service health dashboard
Description:
As a Microsoft Purview user, you'll be able to view outages, service issues, and advisories that might impact your services. This new dashboard will combine the services and solutions health of Purview, Microsoft 365 services, and Azure Cloud Services in one central place in the Purview portal, eliminating the need to go to several places to find this information.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat for EDU customers ages 13 and older
Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 EDU users ages 13 and older who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. Admins must take action to enable access.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint
Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Lists in Context IQ
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Lists through the Context IQ menu to help ground their prompts when using Copilot Chat.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: SQL-like commands in the search bar
Description:
Efficiently narrow down your search results by using SQL-like commands in the search bar. Users can quickly filter messages, files, or conversations with precise queries such as from:username, with:username or in:channel.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Show teammates' calendars in the left navigation pane
Description:
Users can now see their teammates' calendars (including peers, direct reports, and managers) automatically displayed in the left navigation pane of the new outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Summarization in Edge for Business Context Menu
Description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce a Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat summarization menu item to our context menu. This feature will help users quickly unpack and ask questions about their open page.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat response output
Description:
Easily interact with Microsoft Graph content represented by bolder references, new action bar, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker attribution now  “On” by default in BYOD rooms with enhanced admin controls
Description:
New PowerShell setting (SpeakerAttributionBYOD in csTeamsAIPolicy), enabled by default, gives IT admins more control over speaker attribution in BYOD (bring your own device) meeting rooms. This enhances the experience for users by enabling clear speaker labels and richer in-meeting and post-meeting insights with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Users just enroll profiles via Teams Settings to be recognized.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
Description:
We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Description:
Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
Description:
Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
Description:
Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Unified video branded start page
Description:
This creates a unified Clipchamp and Stream start page that serves as a single video destination of creation, consumption, and discovery.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Settings Improvements
Description:
Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
Description:
Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) - Support for embedded images in files including Office files in SharePoint and OneDrive
Description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) scanning enables Microsoft Purview to scan images for sensitive information. With Embedded support, OCR will scan content in DOCX, PPTX, XLSX and PDFs (scanned and hybrid containing searchable text and images). This will be in addition to support for standalone images
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Places: Microsoft Places Support to GCC cloud
Description:
Microsoft Places features will now be available in GCC cloud
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Copilot surfaces important emails in new priority view
Description:
Copilot makes it easy to identify high-priority emails and emails that need a reply, by offering a priority view directly within your Outlook inbox.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: Use Primary work profile as default profile to open external links
Description:
Microsoft Edge currently opens external links using the “Last Used” profile by default. While for enterprise users, the Primary Work Profile (signed in with a Microsoft Entra ID for enrolling the device) is normally the best profile for opening external links. With this feature, for Windows, Edge will check if it the Primary Work Profile exists and make it the default profile for opening external links if available. For Mac and Linux, if only one work profile signed in with a Microsoft Entra ID account is found, it’s treated as the Primary Work Profile. Admins can config the policy “EdgeOpenExternalLinksWithPrimaryWorkProfileEnabled” to turn this feature off.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Agentic AI - powered Submissions Response for Improved Result Explainability
Description:
We are introducing intuitive responses powered by Agentic AI for admin-submitted messages analyzed by Microsoft.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Usage reports - Message consumption for Pay-as-you-go experiences in Copilot Chat.
Description:
A new report to help IT admins manage costs for billed messages that are Pay-as-you-go enabled for Copilot Chat. Reporting includes drill down of billed messages per user, per billing policy, per agent-level and agent-user level pair.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI: Additional permissions for AI roles
Description:
New roles added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI that are customized to accessing AI data.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in Microsoft 365 Copilot
Description:
The broader Microsoft 365 Copilot team are working on supporting 6 new languages across all M365 Copilot features. These are (in alphabetical order) Albanian, Filipino, Icelandic, Malay, Maltese, and Serbian (Cyrillic). The planned release of support for Kazakh language is delayed; we will provide updates as they become available
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): SharePoint agent web part
Description:
SharePoint site page authors can add SharePoint agents to their pages with an agent web part, allowing end users to easily access and interact with SharePoint agents directly from the site pages.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI- additional Microsoft Copilot integrations
Description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI support for Fabric Copilot and Security Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
Description:
Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Agents in OneDrive
Description:
Find yourself referencing the same files to Copilot in OneDrive? We are bringing the power of agents to OneDrive, allowing you to build, use, and share your own agents using files and content stored in your OneDrive. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - MIP auto-labeling for Azure SQL & Storage
Description:
Extend your sensitivity labels to specific or all subscriptions within Azure Storage and Azure SQL Server via auto-labeling policy. Clearly define labeling conditions for data sources beyond M365 without fear of it interfering with existing M365 files configurations.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
Description:
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

GA date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Agents usage report
Description:
A new agents usage report will be available in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The report will be scoped to include agents in M365 Copilot and Copilot Chat with usage by both M365 Copilot licensed and unlicensed users. The report will include total active agent users, total active agents, active users segmentation by licensed and unlicensed users, and active users and active agents segmentation by publisher type (i.e. user-created agents, agents built by your org, agents built by Microsoft, agents built by Microsoft partners). The report will also include usage details per user, agent, and user-agent pair.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft CoPilot (Microsoft 365): List email attachments in M365 Copilot
Description:
Users will be able to list the file attachments that they received or sent over email in M365 Copilot.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Play a Sound Rule
Description:
You will be able to set up Outlook rules to play a sound whenever an email that matches your chosen conditions arrives - whether it’s from a specific person, includes certain words, or meets any other rule criteria you define. This feature helps you stay alerted to the emails that matter most. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Outlook: Quick steps in the pop-out ribbon
Description:
Quick Steps are now integrated into the ribbon of email pop-out ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows and Web. Users can access and execute their configured Quick Steps directly while reading emails in separate windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Copilot Proactive Drafts
Description:
Copilot will detect emails that are most likely to need a response and pre-generate three options for you review and select from. Save time and energy responding to high priority emails with proactive drafts.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: New Trust Center settings to block file opens using insecure protocols
Description:
New settings in Trust Center will allow users to restrict or allow file opens using FTP/HTTP protocols and fallback to FrontPage Remote Procedure Call (FPRPC) protocol.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Teams Channels in Context IQ
Description:
Users will be able to search for and select Teams Channels in the Context IQ menu to help ground their prompts when using Copilot Chat.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Compact Notification Size
Description:
Users will now have the ability to change the size of Teams notifications. The compact size takes up less space on the user's screen and offers a clean, minimalist design.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Contact Improvements on Outlook Mobile
Description:
On Outlook mobile we are improving the "Contacts" experience by showing additional profile information for your contacts, where applicable. Secondly, this improvement hides identical duplicate contacts.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
Description:
Copilot users will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments in classic Outlook for Windows.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - User Schema Enhancements- Create and Edit Hierarchies
Description:
This feature enables Viva Glint admins to create and edit hierarchies directly within the platform. It empowers admins to easily update and maintain the structure of user data without requiring support.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated UI for Microsoft 365 Copilot App
Description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot app is your starting place for AI at work, offering quick access to secure AI chat, search, files, and content creation in one seamless app.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for GCC
Description:
Copilot in Excel gains powerful new insights and visualizations with Advanced Analysis. Explore your data in a natural, conversational way, while Copilot does the heavy lifting using Python, a rich programming language that supercharges what is possible in your spreadsheets.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
Description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI). Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Unified experience for Copilot Dashboard and Viva Insights analyst workbench
Description:
A new, unified experience for leaders, delegates and analysts that combines the Copilot Dashboard and advanced Copilot reports in Viva Insights analyst workbench into one application.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Investigations
Description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Investigations empowers data security teams to find and mitigate data risk from sensitive data exposure using generative AI-powered deep content analysis enriched with activity signals.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall concurrent attendees increase to 100,000
Description:
Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audience in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 100,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 50,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 100,000 concurrent attendees by selecting the Max Capacity limit to be as high as desired up to 100,000. Reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption) is recommended for every event. This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New email indicators to alert on exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public
Description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management. 1. Sending email with attachments to free public domains: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 2. Sending email with attachments to self: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings in in-context surfaces.
Description:
Now users will be able to view ratings when they view apps within the in-context store in teams.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
Description:
The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now offers meeting series selection on CIQ Menu
Description:
Users will now be able to select meeting series and related instances from CIQ to submit as part of their prompts to Copilot Chat.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): The chat experience now offers better search refinement on CIQ menu Files tab
Description:
Users will now be able to use File Type filters and People refiners to apply search criteria to get to relevant files faster in the CIQ menu.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
Description:
Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
Description:
When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat general availability for GCC
Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Copilot is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
Description:
In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Outlook: Name pronunciation on profile card in Outlook web and Outlook desktop
Description:
You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
Description:
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Researcher is in Microsoft Word
Description:
Researcher agent is now available in Microsoft Word, empowering you to tackle complex, multi-step research tasks with ease. Whether you're exploring new topics or synthesizing information, the agent delivers high-quality, accurate insights—helping you work smarter and faster.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Enterprise and Web Grounding for Draft with Copilot
Description:
Draft with Copilot now has access to your enterprise data to help you craft high quality emails grounded in the right context. You will be able to review the sources used to generate your email draft before you send the mail.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Improved Python-powered answers in Copilot in Excel
Description:
Copilot in Excel now provides improved direct answers to your data analysis questions, using Python.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): 1-click to create a Briefing page based on content in Copilot Notebook
Description:
The 1-click page generation feature helps you complete tasks quickly. With a single click, Copilot creates a Briefing page based on your notebook content—no prompt writing needed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): 1-click to create a FAQ page based on content in Copilot Notebook
Description:
The 1-click page generation feature helps you complete tasks quickly. With a single click, Copilot creates a FAQ page based on your notebook content—no prompt writing needed.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Access Copilot Chat in your Microsoft 365 apps
Description:
Easily access Copilot Chat from the side pane in your Microsoft 365 apps with a commercial Microsoft 365 license or a Microsoft 365 Copilot license.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Catchup on important emails in Copilot Chat
Description:
Copilot Chat helps you stay on top of your inbox by highlighting important and actionable emails such as messages from your manager, leadership, top collaborators, or emails containing tasks when you use prompts like “What’s hot in my inbox?” or “What were the important emails from last week?”
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Inclusive meeting enhancements for sign language users
Description:
Sign language users will benefit from an enhanced meeting experience. Interpreters will be clearly identified in the participant roster and visually distinguished throughout meetings. Deaf and hard-of-hearing participants who use sign language will be automatically detected and elevated to active speaker status, ensuring equal prominence with spoken audio participants. This will help create a more equitable and collaborative environment for everyone.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Insert Graphic
Description:
When composing a message in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, there will be a new Graphics button under the Insert ribbon tab. This opens a panel that will allow users to search and pick from a large selection of emoji, stock photos, and stickers, which are inserted into the message when selected. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot app for DoD environments
Description:
The Microsoft 365 app will be updated to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for DoD environments. This update includes a UI refresh, a new icon, and quick access to key modules like Chat, Search, Create, Notebooks, and Apps.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery additional enhancements
Description:
We are introducing a new set of enhancements to the modernized eDiscovery user interface aimed at improving both functionality and user experience. These updates include the ability to delete searches; bulk add data sources and populating custodian field value for items in review sets and exports. We are also rolling out advanced indexing enhancements, along with a tenant-level premium feature toggle to provide greater administrative control. Additionally, users will benefit from a new analytics process report, and improvements to the search condition builder that now supports logical operators such as AND, OR, and NEAR, enabling more precise and flexible keyword queries.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Outlook: Mail Categories
Description:
Users will be able to assign and remove categories to mails on Android devices.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Meeting Audit Events in GCC
Description:
Teams Audit Events for Meetings, including MeetingDetail and MeetingParticipantDetail, will soon be available in GCC. This enhancement will provide administrators with comprehensive insights into meeting activities, helping to ensure compliance and improve operational efficiency. MeetingDetail: Captures detailed information about meetings, including start and end times, meeting subject, and organizer details. MeetingParticipantDetail: Logs participant information, including join and leave times, participant roles, and any changes in participant status during the meeting. Audit logs are accessible through the Microsoft Purview portal, where administrators can search, filter, and export audit data for detailed analysis. These logs are essential for maintaining compliance, investigating incidents, and ensuring the security of Teams activities.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot can generate an audio overview of a notebook
Description:
Copilot can turn the referenced files in a notebook into a dynamic audio overview, transforming them into a listening experience that’s easy to follow. To generate an audio overview in Copilot Notebooks, select ‘Generate audio overview’ at the top of the notebook. This capability is only available in English currently.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Outlook: Find Text when reading email on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
Description:
The ability to find text when reading email on Outlook will be supported. This feature will bear resemblance to F4 on Outlook for Windows, or Ctrl+F in another apps. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business will soon integrate an entry point into Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat from the address bar
Description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce an easy way for users to get summaries of their open page from the address bar using Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat. This feature seeks to help users more easily understand relevant content and save time.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI - Data Assessments
Description:
Data assessments in Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by viewing default assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Advanced label-based protection for all files on devices
Description:
Turning this feature on will allow users to work on files, including files other than Office and PDF files, with sensitivity labels that apply access control settings in an unencrypted state on their devices. Endpoint DLP will continue to monitor and enforce access control and label-based protection on these files even in unencrypted state and automatically encrypt them before they’re transferred outside from a user’s device. This feature is supported only on Windows devices.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Work context suggestions in Copilot Chat ContextIQ menu
Description:
Copilot Chat will suggest prompts and work context you have access to as you type in the prompt, helping you find relevant information for your conversations.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in Outlook for Mac
Description:
We will be adding declarative agents support in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
Description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
Description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails.
