Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
Description:
Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Outlook: Sort by category
Description:
This adds the ability to sort by category in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP: - App or App Group Restriction support for Edge browser
Description:
Previously, Purview Admins could not restrict Edge browser access to sensitive files through Restricted apps or app groups. With this feature, apps or app groups can be configured to be blocked in Edge, including a message showing policy violation info.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: SharePoint: SharePoint agent usage statistics across all SharePoint sites
Description:
SharePoint agents' usage statistics would be aggregated across all SharePoint sites and available for the tenant admin persona.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Select some text, and instantly get helpful options from Copilot
Description:
The Copilot icon in your document margin gives you a variety of actions you can take on your selected text. One click lets you rewrite, get editorial coaching, and more.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: PowerPoint: Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide Suggestions.
Description:
Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot Suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Outlook: Folder colors in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
Description:
We’re introducing the ability to customize folder icon colors in the New Outlook. This feature lets you change the color of folder icons, making it easier to differentiate and personalize your folders visually. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
Description:
Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Pin favorites at the top in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
Description:
Easily access your most-used folders by pinning them at the top of your Left Nav Bar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This feature streamlines navigation, ensuring your important folders are always within reach. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - New Allow and Off modes for each activity
Description:
The two new modes are Off and Allow. For Off, Endpoint DLP will not trigger events or Alerts and will not trigger notifications. Admins can use this enforcement mode to configure restrictions for a specific group. With Allow, Endpoint DLP will not trigger Alerts and will not trigger notifications but will trigger events in Activity explorer.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing the SCO Setting in Walkie Talkie app for Enhanced Battery Life on older Bluetooth headsets
Description:
This feature introduces SCO (Synchronous Connection-Oriented) user setting in the Walkie Talkie app. This feature is designed to manage the Bluetooth headset connection to optimize battery life. When a Bluetooth headset is connected to the Walkie Talkie app, the SCO setting controls whether the microphone remains constantly connected or disconnects after a period of inactivity. This helps in reducing battery drain by allowing the headset to disconnect when not in use and reconnect when needed. The user control feature allows users to set a timeout period after which the Bluetooth headset will automatically disconnect if there is no activity. While the SCO setting is turned on, users may experience a slight delay in transmission as the headset reconnects. However, once the headset is reconnected, users will hear a sound indicating that they can start transmitting on the app. This brief delay is a small trade-off for the substantial battery savings on older Bluetooth headsets.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Wired headset support for the Walkie Talkie app on iOS
Description:
This feature adds the wired support to Walkie Talkie on iOS. It adds support for both specialized PTT headsets and generic headsets.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Share Recap Notes to Outlook (Premium)
Description:
Meeting organizers and presenters have the capability to share recap notes and follow-up tasks directly from Teams to Outlook, facilitating the seamless sending of post meeting follow-up emails.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
Description:
Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enrichment of Messages in Business Chat
Description:
This feature is designed to enhance your communication experience by making it easier to understand and interact with your chat messages in Business Chat. With this feature, you will see cards and hoverable experiences that provide additional details of the chat without leaving your current view. This means you can quickly grasp the context of your conversations and find the information you need more efficiently.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Allow Presenters to moderate Q&A
Description:
Organizers of town halls and webinars can now select and assign presenters to also be Q&A moderators, allowing them to manage and publish questions asked during the event. This feature lets organizers make changes to the group of moderators at any time, before or during the event, and it is available to all users organizing a town hall or webinar, regardless of license.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
Description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site. It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
Description:
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: June CY2024

Title: Outlook: Manage email in PST files in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to move, copy, delete, flag/unflag, mark as read/unread, and set categories for email within .pst files. Additionally, users will be able to create, delete, move, and rename folders within .pst files. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Outlook: Move email between mailbox and PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able move (drag and drop) emails from a .pst file to a mailbox and vice versa. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Enhanced admin notification settings experience
Description:
This creates a modernized user experience for admin notification settings within Viva Engage.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Iphone)
Description:
With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Android)
Description:
With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Verified Answers
Description:
Certain users like experts and admins will be able to mark answers to questions as verified answers to signal a credible and accurate answer. Questions with verified answers will receive its own special verified label and badge at the top of the question and on the verified answer. The goal of verified answers is to help enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in Viva Engage.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
Description:
Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Connections on the SharePoint app bar
Description:
The Connections in the SharePoint App bar feature will provide a seamless entry point to Viva Connections from SharePoint, enhancing the synergy between the Intranet and Viva Connections.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - New Outlook for Windows
Description:
The Microsoft 365 apps usage report will include usage metrics for the new Outlook for Windows. This feature allows organizations to monitor the adoption and usage of the new Outlook for Windows client within their organization. The report provides detailed metrics on the number of active users who have transitioned from Outlook for Windows (classic) to the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
Description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Word: Email Notification Context Previews for Files Protected with Microsoft Purview
Description:
Notification emails for mentions, tasks, comments, and replies will now contain context previews even when the source document is encrypted, and the email will inherit the document's security policies.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to view inferred skills and course recommendations
Description:
Learners would be able to select skills for learning, view inferred skills and courses recommendations based on inferred skills. Inferred skills are generated by taking users activity in M365 ecosystem into account.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Collection policies impact on IRM
Description:
With this update, Microsoft Purview will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. We recommend reviewing collection policies as they can be created by different Purview solution admins to ensure they are setup to detect the activities required by IRM policies Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: Outlook: Meeting details card for shared and delegated calendar invites
Description:
Delegates will be able to see the shared calendar event details, including the principal calendar, in the meeting details card on meeting invite messages. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Integrated apps and Copilot extensions
Description:
The Teams app usage report will be renamed to the Integrated Apps usage report and redesigned with new metrics and charts. These will provide insights into apps enabled for Teams, Outlook, Microsoft 365 apps, and Microsoft 365 Copilot (Copilot extensions) in your organization. The report will feature two sections: App Usage and User Activity. Insights will be organized by Publishing Type (Line-of-business apps, Microsoft partner apps, and Microsoft apps), Host Product (Teams, Microsoft 365 app, Outlook, Copilot), and Platform (Desktop, Mobile, Web). Additionally, the report will include views of app and user details.
GA date: December CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced recommendations for no-alert policies
Description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get insights-enhanced recommendations for policies that do not generate alerts on the policy page. The enhancement provides admins with recommended thresholds derived from real-time analytics, making the recommendations highly actionable and enabling the effectiveness of the policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: September CY2023

Title: OneDrive: New empty state images
Description:
You will see new and improved images and text in various views on OneDrive for Web when there are no files associated with those views. These images will appear in new OneDrive accounts that have no stored files, and they may appear in existing OneDrive accounts that have no recent, favorited, shared, or recycled files. As an example, if you have no favorited files, you will see an image of a star with text that reads “Items you favorite will show up here."
GA date: February CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
Description:
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

GA date: January CY2024
Preview date: December CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Import and Search function support for Sensitive service domains group
Description:
Purview Endpoint DLP improve the management of Sensitive service domains group by allowing you to import a URL group and search specific URL across all groups.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Group-less campaigns in Viva Amplify
Description:
We are streamlining the campaign management experience in Viva Amplify and campaigns will no longer be tied to M365 groups. As such, M365 Group admins will no longer be a required role to configure Viva Amplify and only SharePoint admin role will be required. Also, when you create a campaign, there will no longer be a campaign channel tied to the Viva Amplify campaign, simplifying the campaign creation experience.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants for Teams meetings
Description:
We are updating the default policy for Transcription in Teams meetings from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This update applies only to Teams meetings and does not affect transcription policies for calls. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
Description:
Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
Description:
Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspaces for Microsoft 365 GCC
Description:
Loop workspaces and the full Loop app experience are available to Microsoft 365 GCC customers at loop.cloud.microsoft.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: SMS for Microsoft Teams Calling Plans
Description:
Enabling the ability to send and receive SMS messages directly from the Teams app on desktop or mobile, making it easy to connect with users outside of your organization who are not using Teams. This feature will be available for Microsoft Teams Calling Plan users in the United States and Canada.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
Description:
All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
Description:
Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats
Description:
Service level is now available as part of Queues App realtime stats. Authorized users will be able to review the Service level metric and adjust staffing accordingly.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
Description:
Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
Description:
We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
Description:
Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Edge contextual capabilities in Business Chat work mode
Description:
In Business Chat work mode, users can ask Copilot questions about web pages and PDFs opened in the Edge browser using page context, such as “summarize this page". This feature is currently also available in Business Chat web mode.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Planner: Increased number of tasks and dependencies per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
Description:
Create and manage up to 3,000 tasks and 2,000 dependencies within a Microsoft Planner premium plan.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Read-only access to contacts within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read contacts within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
Description:
This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop guest sharing via Entra B2B configuration for organizations with sensitivity labels
Description:
Enable B2B guest sharing for Loop workspaces, pages, and components, subject to administrator policy. This allows sharing with people outside your tenant and now includes organizations that utilize sensitivity labels.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Outlook: Email Auto-advance setting
Description:
The Email Auto-advance option is available in Mail settings. This will allow users to choose whether they return to the message list after taking certain actions or if they move to the next message.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Outlook: Read-only access to contacts within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read contacts within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Forward as attachment emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to forward as an attachment emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Outlook: Read-only access to calendars within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read calendars and events within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: Outlook: Read-only access to calendars within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read calendars and events within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Whiteboard: Text Sizing Feature
Description:
The Text Sizing feature offers users the ability to: 1. Adjust Font Sizes: Increase or decrease font sizes as needed. 2. Preset Font Sizes: Choose from preset font sizes for convenience. 3. Custom Text Size: Input custom text sizes for enhanced clarity. This feature enhances readability, improves clarity, and establishes a structured visual hierarchy, ensuring well-organized and easily comprehensible content on the board.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Network share coverage and exclusion support on Mac endpoints
Description:
With this feature, sensitive data in files stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Outlook: Mail Merge (Advanced) on Outlook on the Web and new Outlook for Windows
Description:
Mail Merge (Basic) will be improved upon to allow fields to be replaced by values per email address. When Mail Merge (Advanced) is launched, not only will every recipient receive their own email with only their email address in the recipients list, but the emails can further be personalized to include content such as their name. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies in Exchange
Description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail
GA date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for Web
Description:
Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for the Web in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
Description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Receive coaching on your writing in Copilot in Word
Description:
The Copilot context menu will include an option for getting AI-generated coaching. Copilot will review the writing and offer suggestions for high-impact areas, such as logical structure, flow, and tone.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
Description:
The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
Description:
Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
Description:
Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
Description:
Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
Description:
This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
Description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting Notes now available in Microsoft Teams for Education
Description:
Teams meeting Notes, powered by Loop, is now available in Microsoft Teams for Education. Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot web grounding now available in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
Description:
Ground your Copilot chat conversations with the latest information from the web in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
Description:
Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Filter between active and archived teams in Shifts app schedules
Description:
Coming soon for the Shifts app in Microsoft Teams: An enhanced All schedules view with a new dropdown filter, enabling you to easily switch between active and archived teams. This feature helps reduce clutter, allowing managers and frontline workers to concentrate on the schedules of active teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
Description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Admin email support for Report a problem
Description:
Admins can designate an email address for receiving ‘Report a problem’ submissions from users in Teams Rooms on Android. The email address can be set through device settings and the Teams admin center.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Loop generates a workspace after your Teams meeting
Description:
A workspace is jumpstarted and actively updated as new materials are shared in Teams to enable ongoing collaboration within Loop.
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Work from your recent prompts in Draft with Copilot
Description:
Based on what you're typing, Copilot in Word shows your most recent prompts, which you can use as-is or modify in Draft with Copilot.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Design ideas for quick links webpart
Description:
Design Ideas now provides formatting suggestions for the quick links webpart. This includes suggesting icons and images for a given link, as well as showing how the webpart would look with different card sizes, for single quick link webparts in a section.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): In Copilot Pages, the Chat can now be used to modify the Page
Description:
When a Chat and a Page are open side by side, prompts within the Chat can now be used to modify or add to the contents of the Page.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
Description:
This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
Description:
With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Priority content support for Risky AI usage
Description:
With this update, Risky AI usage policy template will support priority content. Customers can define Sensitive Info Types (SITs), Trainable Classifiers, Sensitivity Labels as priority content, and get alerted only when the activity matches the selected priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
Description:
Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Designated experts in communities
Description:
We are introducing the Community Expert in Viva Engage to enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in your communities. Experts will be able to endorse accurate and credible answers and be recognized as community experts with a special label next to their name.
GA date: January CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
Description:
Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Design Ideas for Blank Flexible Sections
Description:
When you add a blank flexible section to your page, you will now be able to open up the Design Ideas panel to get blank section suggestions just as you can for standard sections.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Design Ideas Suggests Images from Org Assets
Description:
SharePoint Design ideas can now pull from your Org Asset images to use within design ideas. If available when performing image suggestion, the first 3 ideas will show suggestions with images from org assets, whereas the rest of the ideas will use stock images.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support large documents in Word Copilot
Description:
Support customers referencing large documents
GA date: April CY2025

Title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
Description:
Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
Description:
Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.
GA date: September CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Share site's built-in agent
Description:
Allows the built in SharePoint agent on a site to be shared and used in Teams.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
Description:
Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Auto-association of BYOD room devices in the Pro Management portal
Description:
Manually associating peripherals to rooms may feel like an endless task if your organization has several bring your own device (BYOD) rooms. IT admins can streamline the process and get enhanced inventory visibility with this feature which utilizes meeting room invite data to intelligently associate peripherals to these spaces.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
Description:
We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Extensibility for PSTN calls
Description:
Third-party application developers will be able to extend the PSTN calling experience in Teams with contextual information, making it possible for Teams users to have access to relevant data without leaving the call experience. This brings additional context and workflow integration into calling experiences and makes customer facing professionals more efficient by having data from line of business applications readily available. This functionality is available for developers to integrate their applications and add new functionality to calls.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
Description:
Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Private moderator replies to individual attendees
Description:
Allows moderators to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
Description:
In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Swap screens on Teams Rooms on Android
Description:
Admins can switch the screens of Teams Rooms on Android devices in dual display mode remotely, correcting front-of-room display issues without physical support. The screen swap control is accessible in device settings and the Teams admin center.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Net Promoter Score survey on Teams Rooms on Android
Description:
Users can rate how likely they are to recommend Microsoft Teams Rooms from 1 to 5 as well as provide additional comments on Teams Rooms on Android devices.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
Description:
With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet. This integration unlocks powerful analytics via Python for visualizations, cleaning data, machine learning, predictive analytics, and more—without needing to be Python proficient yourself. We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
Description:
With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection: SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files
Description:
This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files in the target library. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the document library. Changes to user permissions on the document library are reflected on downloaded files, including full revocation for users removed from the document library. This provides a more centralized information worker-managed permission model that also offers revocation capabilities at a user level, rather than per-document. 
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
Description:
Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
Description:
We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
Description:
The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
Description:
We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Multiple column layouts in email
Description:
Viva Amplify authored email will support two column layouts.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Animated GIFs in email
Description:
We are bringing animated GIFs to email crafted by Viva Amplify. GIFs of limited size will appear as animations in Outlook clients.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
Description:
Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
Description:
This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Account descriptions
Description:
New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
Description:
When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content. Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
Description:
Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
Description:
With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
Description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
Description:
Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
Description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
Description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
Description:
The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot takes emails and meetings into account while drafting content in Word
Description:
You will no longer need to reference certain types of organizational data for Copilot to generate contextually relevant content. People and chats will still need to be referenced explicitly.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
Description:
Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
Description:
Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Share prompts with others in Business Chat and Copilot Lab
Description:
Easily share a prompt with others in the form of a link.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
Description:
Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat by clicking "Upload" in the ContextIQ interface.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Enhance the Comment Experience for Live Surveys
Description:
Updating the survey experience to provide ability to display the comment box on the screen when a user is providing a rating. Currently, the survey automatically progresses to the next question after the user selects a rating, without giving them an opportunity to leave a comment. With this change, the program will have the ability for the comment box will be persistently visible, encouraging users to provide more qualitative feedback alongside their rating.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Email Previews for Live Surveys
Description:
Customers can preview and test email notifications for survey start (available in VG), survey reminder and survey end/results rollout after configuring and approving program settings.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
Description:
This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
Description:
Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
Description:
Annotating with hand-drawn content in the OneDrive apps for iOS and iPadOS is now easier than ever. Enjoy various types of annotation tools and expressive strokes that match your pressure.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User analytics
Description:
With this feature, insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences: 1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation 2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation 3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page 4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in their tenant from Insider Risk Management settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Zero downtime for Viva Glint releases
Description:
Viva Glint releases previously needed several hours of downtime. With this feature, future releases will be transparent to customers, requiring no downtime planning.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
Description:
With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document size equals or is greater than, document name contains words or phrases, and document is password protected.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
Description:
Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
Description:
SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
Description:
Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
Description:
In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
Description:
Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
Description:
We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
Description:
When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
Description:
With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
Description:
Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
Description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within GCCH
Description:
Users within GCCH will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
Description:
Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
Description:
The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
Description:
Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
Description:
Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
Description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
Description:
The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Content Consumption Update
Description:
Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
Description:
Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. This setting is supported for labels with admin-defined protection.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
Description:
The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Windows 365: Available from New Zealand North
Description:
Windows 365 will be available in New Zealand North.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Bookings: ''Cc" functionality to email notifications
Description:
"CC" additional email addresses on confirmation & reminder emails for 1:1 & N:1 appointments.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Configure External access policies in TAC
Description:
External access policies can be managed in Teams admin center. These policies were previously only supported in PowerShell, and we are bringing the same capabilities into the Teams admin center user experience.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Summarize text columns
Description:
Copilot can analyze columns of text to give you summaries of the information. For example, Copilot will find the main themes in survey responses from open-ended questions.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for formula data summaries in rows and cells
Description:
Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Outlook: Support for Exchange On-Premises Servers
Description:
Outlook for Mac will support accounts for Microsoft Exchange on-premises servers.

GA date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
Description:
For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in. This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Edge: v.133 - Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
Description:
Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot for GCC Moderate
Description:
We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Microsoft 365 Copilot. This report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, and user-level activity insights (anonymized by default).
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Audience breakdown tooltip
Description:
Amplify reports will provide a breakdown of the channels shown in the Unique viewers card. The tool tip will show the top 5 channel audiences and their contribution to the overall numbers for each publication channel presented in the report.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Rich artifacts in Copilot Pages
Description:
You can now create rich artifacts, including interactive charts, tables, complex diagrams, and code created with Copilot from enterprise or web data. Artifacts can be added to Pages to further edit and refine with Copilot. They are interactive and stay in sync across Microsoft 365 when shared for collaborative work.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
Description:
Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Short meeting URL
Description:
We are making meeting URL shorter and removing unnecessary symbols/info from there to make it more convenient for sharing
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspace sensitivity labels
Description:
Users can apply container-level sensitivity labels to Loop workspaces to prevent oversharing and manage access effectively.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Formula Conditional Formatting
Description:
Additional support for complex conditional formats beyond the basic top and bottom or conditional operators. For example, Copilot analyzes two factors when highlighting all rows where the product is bikes and sales is greater than 100.
GA date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
Description:
Social signals like ratings and views are included in Search relevancy and users can now search for author and provider.
GA date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing the New Republish Feature in Viva Amplify
Description:
We’re excited to launch Republish, a new feature that keeps your content fresh, extends its reach, and maximizes engagement across SharePoint, Viva Engage, Outlook, and Teams. Update existing published content in a few clicks, re-share key messages to new audiences or channels, correct errors and refine your messaging —all without starting from scratch. Republish in Viva Amplify makes content management effortless.
GA date: December CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meetings for GCC
Description:
Copilot helps you run more effective meetings, get up to speed on the conversation, organize key discussion points, and summarize key actions so it’s clear what you need to do next. Users can type any question or use predetermined prompts during or after the meeting, and their interactions with Copilot are only visible to them. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva - Copilot dashboard Exclusion List through Entra(AAD) groups
Description:
For the Copilot dashboard, the exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
Description:
This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
Description:
User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search. 2/12/2025: This roadmap item was changed inadvertently to Launched. The correct status is Rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Outlook: Easily start a new email from document previewer in the Outlook app for Android
Description:
From the document previewer, there will now be an option to start a new mail with the document being viewed added to that new email
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
Description:
Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner app for the web
Description:
We apologize for any inconvenience; this roadmap item should have included GCC as was communicated in the associated Message center post. The new Microsoft Planner app for the web is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of Microsoft To Do, the collaboration of Planner, and the power of Microsoft Project into a simple, scalable, intelligent solution that spans from individual task management to enterprise and professional project management.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams
Description:
This adds new Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams metric to Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
Description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with. News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
Description:
With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

Title: Outlook: Message Recall
Description:
Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: AIR Initiated Remediation Logging
Description:
The AIR attribution update will empower customers with enhanced insights by deciphering between remediations produced by AIR versus truly manual remediations initiated independently by SecOps teams. Presently, all actions produced by AIR and approved by SecOps are logged as manual remediations throughout the portal. With this update, messages that are remediated as a result of approval of an AIR action will be logged as SecOps approved automated actions.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: Long-term retention period for M365 Backup
Description:
This creates the ability to set longer term retention periods to restore beyond one year.
GA date: August CY2026
Preview date: March CY2026

Title: Whiteboard: Sticky notes accelerator
Description:
Sticky note accelerators will help users work faster in Whiteboard by simplifying adding sticky notes. With a single click, users can quickly add sticky notes, making brainstorming and collaboration seamless.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive file-level archiving
Description:
This introduces archiving at the file level for Microsoft 365 Archive.
GA date: July CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026

Title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap can be shared via link
Description:
Meeting participants can now share a link to the meeting recap from the meeting thumbnail in chat and the recap tab, making it easier to reference and share the meeting recap insights with others. Meeting participants can share the meeting recap link with anyone in their organization, for those users who don't have access to the recording or transcript, they need to request recording and transcript access before they can access the meeting recap.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
Description:
