The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
Description:
Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Multi-language posts
Description:
Authors of Viva Engage posts will be able to add multiple manually written translations to a single post.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
Description:
This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and learner profile cards.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
Description:
Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
Description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2023

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
Description:
Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
Description:
The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
Description:
Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: 3x3 video gallery on dual displays for Teams Rooms on Android
Description:
Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
Description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: June CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Edit SharePoint site's built-in agent
Description:
Allows the built in SharePoint agent to be edited without having to create a new agent for the site.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: SharePoint: Agent usage statistics per SharePoint site
Description:
SharePoint agents' usage statistics will be available for every SharePoint site. This will be available on the site analytics page for the site owner persona. This will also include analytics on how many times source files are cited.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds
Description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams now available for multitenant organizations
Description:
Copilot is available to users in a multitenant organization, provided the user has an active Copilot license in their host tenant.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
Description:
You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
Description:
Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Admin ability to assign Delegates
Description:
Admins (Global administrators or Insights administrators) will now be able to assign or remove delegates for a Manager in Viva Insights via PowerShell. Previously, only Managers could assign delegates. Now, this ability provides delegate access in Insights to admins, allowing for ease and flexibility.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
Description:
Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Planner: Board view in My Tasks
Description:
Board view in My Tasks offers a visual representation of your tasks similar to a kanban board, making it easier to track progress and manage your workload. See all your tasks at a glance and move them between columns to update their progress. You can group tasks by Plan, Progress, Due Date, and Priority, allowing you to tailor the board to your specific needs. Board view is available in addition to the existing grid view in My Tasks.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Real-time policy tuning analysis
Description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time policy alert prediction based on the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Exchange: Adding support for Inbound SMTP DANE with DNSSEC for Exchange Online GCC-H and DoD
Description:
We are adding inbound support for SMTP DANE with DNSSEC to Exchange Online GCC-H and DoD. Look for another roadmap item for inbound support in WW and GCC, and one for outbound support of SMTP DANE with DNSSEC.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

Title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
Description:
The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: January CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
Description:
As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
Description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
Description:
These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
Description:
Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Outlook: Sort and Filter improvements on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
Description:
Sort and Filter will now be separate buttons in the Message List. This will make it easier to change the Sorted by and the Filtered by values separately. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
Description:
The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Forms: Migrate Google Forms through the M365 Admin Center
Description:
Support Google Forms to Microsoft Forms migration via M365 admin center. Note: The current release phase has been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
GA date: September CY2023

Title: Outlook: Local Contact Search
Description:
With a newly added search bar, you may now search your local contact list in Outlook mobile by typing the name of a contact.

GA date: October CY2023
Preview date: September CY2023

Title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management in Teams Admin Center to manage the Apps access for tenants, end-users, and groups
Description:
App centric management introduces new admin settings to control who in the tenant can install Teams apps. First, admins can set a default value for new apps that are published to Teams app store. Second, admins can edit the availability of an app to 'All users can install', 'Specific users and groups can install', or 'No user can install'. This feature evolves the existing app permission policies and provides admins with the ability to manage access to the app individually. The app permission policies for existing customers are migrated to maintain existing app availability in the tenant.

GA date: November CY2023

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
Description:
Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

GA date: December CY2023

Title: Microsoft Viva: Using Topics in Viva Engage will grant limited access to Viva Topic Names
Description:
As part of the Viva Engage (Yammer) transition to the Viva Topics platform, Viva Engage posts (conversations, questions, polls, announcements, storyline posts) will be considered as Viva Topic resources. As a result, topic names will be applied to posts and will grant limited access to the topic for all users with access to the post.
GA date: September CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
Description:
Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state. Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
GA date: December CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply protection at the time of egress on endpoints (U.S. Government clouds)
Description:
Extend protection to unclassified files on Windows endpoint by applying restrictions defined in DLP policies at the time of egress.

GA date: November CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy
Description:
Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

GA date: August CY2023

Title: Microsoft Viva: Export Viva Goals OKR view to PowerPoint
Description:
New feature allows users export a list and create a slide for each OKR in PowerPoint

GA date: September CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit (Premium) – Customized retention policies for 10-Year Audit Log Retention Add On
Description:
This feature will enable customers with the 10-Year Audit Log Retention Add On for Microsoft Purview Audit (Premium) to create additional customized retention policies. The new options are 7 days, 30 days, 3 years, 5 years, and 7 years retention.

GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: April CY2023

Title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
Description:
You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Brand Impersonation Protection for Teams Messaging
Description:
Identify if an external user is impersonating a brand commonly targeted by phishing attacks, during their initial contact with an enterprise user via Teams messages.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Schedule messages in channels
Description:
Like in chat, you can now schedule send messages in channels. You can optimize the timing of your messages based on the recipient's work hours, out-of-office time, etc, and ensuring your messages are delivered at the most suitable time.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
Description:
With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
Description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint - Document is unscannable - Document didn't complete scanning - Document name matches patterns - Document size equals or is greater than
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for PowerPoint will help you build your story's narrative
Description:
Steer your narrative with Copilot when creating a PowerPoint presentation.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Loop available in Loop components in Teams and Outlook
Description:
People with a Copilot License can now leverage Copilot in Loop when they paste Loop components into the Teams app, Outlook, and Meeting Notes.
GA date: May CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Custom chart and PivotTable creation
Description:
You can now ask for more specific charts and PivotTables, including specifying the x and y axis of charts.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
Description:
Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Loop: Copilot-assisted Loop Page Creation
Description:
Collaborate with Copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand.
GA date: July CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
Description:
Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Planner: Baseline with Task level variance
Description:
Capture a Baseline of your plan and view plan and task-level variances to know if the plan is on track or delayed.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Change history reports
Description:
Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.
GA date: August CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms aids students with step-by-step solutions for quiz questions
Description:
With Copilot in Forms quizzes, teachers can easily generate step-by-step solutions for each question. Teachers have the option to allow students to immediately view their results so they can see what they've mastered and where they need further studying using the step-by-step solutions supported by Copilot.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support in Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection
Description:
With this capability organizations will be able to delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC) via Azure Active Directory Administrative Units.  Eg – German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users.

GA date: October CY2023

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Support for inline videos and GIFs in articles
Description:
This adds support for inline videos and GIFs in Viva Engage articles.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
Description:
Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
Description:
With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Information Protection: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
Description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
Description:
This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
Description:
This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
Description:
Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: Behaviors
Description:
A new data type in Microsoft 365 Defender Advanced Hunting. Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.
GA date: May CY2024
Preview date: May CY2023

Title: OneDrive: Upcoming change to shared folder experience in Microsoft OneDrive
Description:
With this feature update, when a user clicks a link to a shared folder from Teams chat, channels, email, or other places, they will navigate to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This new view, organized by people, will show and allow access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry can ground their agent in files stored in SharePoint
Description:
Tenant Graph grounding provides grounding for agents with relevant information from Microsoft Graph, including files stored in SharePoint. This capability is now available to developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

Title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (iPhone)
Description:
With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

Title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
Description:
With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

Title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
Description:
Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively. Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

Title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
Description:
Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively. Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt with a co-worker
Description:
Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Prompt Gallery, inspiring your co-workers to achieve more with Copilot.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Outlook: Search Meeting Attendees
Description:
Allow user to search meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online
Description:
This release will extend OCR support in Exchange online from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PDF) to images embedded inside following files: 1. Office: Images embedded inside XLSX, DOCX, PPTX files. 2. PDF: Image-only PDF files are already supported. This release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text. 3. Container files such as ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZ and more.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Data control to enable recycling or reuse of Employee IDs
Description:
By implementing a control for processing Employee IDs, we enable our customers to efficiently recycle or reuse Employee IDs, particularly in scenarios involving rehiring.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Data control to process survey data upon receiving a delete signal
Description:
Empower the customer to control survey data processing upon receiving a DSR request (Data Subject Rights) or Entra ID delete signal, ensuring compliance with data retention policies.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Outlook: RSVP improvements in event context menu in new Outlook for Windows and web
Description:
Changes to the event's right-click context menu will make it easier to respond to meeting invitations from the Calendar surface. All RSVP options will be on the first level of the menu. There will be also separate options to respond to either all events in the series or just the current instance. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newOutlookforWindows
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Upload custom PowerPoint templates
Description:
Enhance your exported presentations with the ability to upload custom PowerPoint templates, ensuring consistent branding in every export.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to export policy settings
Description:
Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - SharePoint results integration in Viva Learning Search
Description:
Users will be able to discover relevant internal SharePoint content seamlessly while searching within Viva Learning, ensuring they have access to all pertinent resources in one place.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy reports in Viva Insights
Description:
Usage reporting for Copilot Academy will be available in Viva Insights via the Analyst Workbench. Users can access these reports through Excel or a PowerBI dashboard.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, and Notes panes can be popped out from the meeting window
Description:
When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
Description:
You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
Description:
You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
Description:
We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Sharepoint: Sharepoint Agents
Description:
SharePoint users can create an agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
Description:
This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
Description:
Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.
GA date: March CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva-Glint - Self service for custom access data user export
Description:
This feature allows Glint admins to export the access rules defined for survey programs, administration, and focus areas that has been customized for users in the platform.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Edit questions associated to live surveys
Description:
Allow Glint Admins to edit select fields of a question that is associated to live surveys.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Support multitenancy organization via cross tenant sync
Description:
Enables one instance of Viva Glint to be used by employees in multiple M365 tenants
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
Description:
Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
Description:
Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
Description:
New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
Description:
AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

GA date: December CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
Description:
When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
Description:
You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Import HRIS data in Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center
Description:
Customers will be able to use various connectors to HRIS tools to import HRIS data into Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center.
GA date: January CY2026

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
Description:
To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).
GA date: August CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Advanced moderation access control for corporate communicators
Description:
Network admins can choose to enable advanced moderation access for corporate communicators to manage AI themes + keywords detected within organization.
GA date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
Description:
Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
Description:
These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
Description:
Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Users can opt-in to try the new calendar in Teams
Description:
The new calendar in Teams combines rich productivity features and the latest innovations, like Microsoft Copilot and Microsoft Places, to help users collaborate seamlessly from anywhere. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, users will see the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams. New calendar is off by default, and users can toggle to try the new experience.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Top questions
Description:
Top Questions shows community members the most-viewed questions in their community over the last 90 days. It is designed to help people quickly find the most relevant and popular questions in their communities.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
Description:
Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom name for Teams panels
Description:
Admins can use the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assign a custom name to their Teams Rooms Pro or Teams Shared Device licensed panels. This new name displays on the panel's home screen, replacing the global address book name that appears in Outlook or Teams.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
Description:
Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
Description:
With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
Description:
With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New ChatGPT Enterprise connector to discover and bring prompts and responses into the scope of Purview features
Description:
Using the unified Purview portal, organizations will be able to establish a connection to their ChatGPT Enterprise workspaces to discover, collect, and store contents of interactions of users with ChatGPT Enterprise into the scope of Purview capabilities and policies.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

Title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
Description:
Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

GA date: April CY2024

Title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
Description:
With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Embedded Knowledge capability support for declarative agents.
Description:
Developers and makers can embed knowledge (pdf, doc/docx, ppt) into their declarative agents built with Teams Toolkit for additional grounding capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Ability to use the Graph connector selector when using Teams Toolkit
Description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit to author declarative agents can select specific Graph connectors to improve their knowledge grounding.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Community replies and reactions in Teams
Description:
Users with the Viva Engage app in Teams will now receive notifications when others reply or react to their posts.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
Description:
Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to take control during screensharing on Web
Description:
This update enables meeting participants using the Microsoft Teams web app to use the "Take control" function to request control while another person is screen-sharing.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Word: Chat with Copilot about selected text
Description:
Start a chat with Copilot while text in your document is selected, and Copilot's response will be scoped to what you have selected.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Kickstart your document with contextual prompts
Description:
Copilot includes files and meetings based on your recent activity when suggesting prompts you can use to draft a new document in Word.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC general availability
Description:
Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC, your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is available in Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook (includes mobile), Word, PowerPoint, and Excel as well as other surfaces, including microsoft365.com.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/public-sector-blog/microsoft-copilot-for-microsoft-365-gcc-ga-update-empowering/ba-p/4222952
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
Description:
Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
Description:
Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Editor simplification and introduction of light mode
Description:
This change will simplify the Clipchamp editing experience and increase the space you have on the stage to make great videos. We're also introducing light mode as a new option for people to choose whether they view the Clipchamp editor in a Light or Dark scheme.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Tips pane entry point moving from Suite Header to Ribbon
Description:
The Tips pane's entry point is moving from the Suite Header (found at the top of the window) to the Help tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
Description:
Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
Description:
Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
Description:
Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
Description:
On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex – simple document processing model
Description:
A prebuilt model that uses OCR and AI to detect the primary language of the file, key-value pairs, tables, selection marks, and barcodes. As with other models, it can be configured to extract this information to specified library columns.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
Description:
Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.
GA date: June CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
Description:
Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Whiteboard Copilot – First run experience
Description:
Copilot FRE will guide first-time users to discover and leverage the power of Whiteboard Copilot features. ​
GA date: April CY2024

Title: Planner: Smart backgrounds for basic plans
Description:
Get ready to customize your plans like never before! With smart backgrounds, you’ll be able to quickly spot the right plans. This feature was part of our legacy Planner experience, and we’re now enabling it for basic plans in the new Planner.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
Description:
Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved Report PDF Exports
Description:
PDFs exported from Glint Reports are improved to be easily printable, searchable, and readable.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
Description:
Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
Description:
Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
Description:
The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
Description:
The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Syntex Optical Character Recognition (OCR) extends support for Microsoft Office files
Description:
SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to Microsoft Office files. Previously, OCR was limited to PDFs and images but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from any embedded images within any Microsoft Office files like Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Bidirectional support for Teams Live Interpretation
Description:
With bidirectional support in Teams Live Interpretation, interpreters can now switch the direction they want to provide translation in between the two languages by clicking on the button of the language they want to interpret into at the bottom of the screen. The highlighted language button will be the language the interpreter is translating into and attendees hear from.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
Description:
Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
Description:
Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Copilot agents available in Business Chat web mode
Description:
In Business Chat web mode, discover and use Copilot agents available for your organization. Agents are custom grounded chats that include specific knowledge sources from work and web.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
Description:
People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
Description:
This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
Description:
Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

GA date: May CY2024

Title: Outlook: Minimize the compose window to multitask in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
Description:
Outlook will help you compose emails more quickly and efficiently by allowing you to minimize your draft emails and quickly access them again from the message list or calendar view. This means that, while composing an email, you can easily get information you need from your calendar or other emails and easily get back into the draft you are working on without ever having to go to the Draft folder.
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
Description:
We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
Description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
Description:
IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: August CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
Description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.
GA date: August CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use Kiota as an API plugin generation tool
Description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit and Kiota can use them together as an API plugin generation tool. This unlocks new scenarios like searching our repository of public APIs, visually selecting the main integration endpoints and improving the maintainability of existing plugins by using a workspace file and allowing full regeneration of plugin files.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
Description:
Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
Description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
Description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip & oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
Description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components (like email body or attachments) only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report - Admins can view line of business agent usage
Description:
Admins can view line of business Copilot agent usage in their tenant from the Microsoft 365 admin center.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
Description:
We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

Title: Windows 365: Resize is enabled for Windows 365 Frontline Cloud PCs
Description:
When changing the Cloud PC size on a specific assignment within the provisioning policy for W365 Frontline, all of the Cloud PCs in that assignment will be resized to the newly selected Cloud PC size.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
Description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
Description:
Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
Description:
Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: October CY2024

Title: SharePoint: Enhanced functionalities to manage SharePoint Embedded Containers through SharePoint Admin Center
Description:
The new update empowers the SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to manage their containers better through sorting and filtering capabilities as well as set sensitivity labels on containers. The SPE Admins now also have user role management capabilities to add, reassign, or remove users from various roles of a container.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
Description:
Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
Description:
As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
Description:
Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Enhancements to insider risk level settings
Description:
This roadmap item was updated to 'launched' unintentionally. We apologize for the inconvenience. With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: May CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detections for obfuscation involving excluded events
Description:
This change enhances sequence detection to improve its effectiveness in identifying users who are performing obfuscation activities that may result in a data security incident, such as file renaming, to evade detection. With this improvement, Insider Risk Management can detect sequences that may result in potential data security incidents, even if the obfuscation activities in those sequences involve excluded events, such as an excluded keyword. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: September CY2023

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility -  Automatic project scaffolding in Teams Toolkit for building Graph connectors
Description:
Developers can now leverage an automatic project scaffolding for Graph connector applications within the Teams Toolkit, allowing for the generation of a full production-ready Graph connector application from just an API description file, significantly reducing setup time and complexity.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can build custom engine agents with the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK
Description:
Developers can use the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK to create custom engine agents. These agents, built on their own AI stack, can be deployed to various platforms, including Microsoft 365 Copilot, Microsoft Teams, and other non-Microsoft channels.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
Description:
Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Volume ratio control for language interpretation
Description:
New user setting that enables meeting participants using language interpretation to control the volume ratio between the original meeting audio and the interpretation audio.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
Description:
Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
Description:
This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

Title: Microsoft 365: Updated settings for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
Description:
The Microsoft 365 app on Windows added settings to pin the app to the taskbar.
GA date: February CY2025

Title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
Description:
Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
Description:
Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365: Information Barriers (IB) upgrading from IB v1 to IB v2 with new capabilities
Description:
Information Barriers (IB) V2 brings new capabilities including larger segment scale support, multi-segment support, and flexible people discoverability etc. Existing IB v1 tenants require an upgrade to IB v2 to take advantage of these new capabilities. This roadmap item is intended only for all IB v1 customers. All other customers will get IB v2 capabilities when they enable IB in their tenants. IB v2 upgrade will be opt-in.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: October CY2025

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience
Description:
Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience for declarative agents and API plugins in Teams Toolkit.
GA date: May CY2025

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
Description:
Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.
GA date: September CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard Scope Filter enhancements
Description:
Introducing exciting new features to help you better understand and improve adoption and impact of Copilot for Microsoft 365 through the Copilot Dashboard. Enhancements include supporting multi-select capabilities for Scope filters to facilitate group comparisons and the ability to upload HR organizational data for Scope filter updates.
GA date: March CY2025

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
Description:
We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.
GA date: July CY2025

Title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
Description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448
GA date: January CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places
Description:
Microsoft Places is an AI-powered workplace app for flexible work, empowering hybrid employees to foster in-office collaboration and leveraging insights into space optimization. Places intelligently allows you to coordinate your hybrid team to make the most of in-office days, modernize how employees make connections, and optimize space management with occupancy and utilization data.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved creation, editability, and saved views in review dashboards
Description:
Users will save time in preparing for goal review processes with a simplified review dashboard creation and editing experience, and the ability to leverage saved views instead of starting from scratch. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: December CY2023

Title: Microsoft 365: "Help me create" in Microsoft 365
Description:
"Help me create" is a content create feature in Microsoft365.com that is powered by Copilot for Microsoft 365. Like Copilot, "Help me create" is built on Microsoft's comprehensive approach to security, compliance, and privacy.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: October CY2023

Title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
Description:
Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.
GA date: June CY2024

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Enhanced Filters and Custom Views
Description:
User can now filter OKRs in entity and explorer pages and save custom views to quickly access views that are most relevant.

GA date: December CY2023

Title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
Description:
Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.
GA date: December CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Managed booking with Copilot
Description:
Building on booking suggestions, Copilot's managed booking feature rebooks room declines for single and recurring meetings, especially when room availability varies week to week. Additionally, Copilot will handle any changes, updates, and conflicts to guarantee a room for your meetings.
GA date: November CY2024

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics
Description:
